item.title: Trying to make it so Owner can't be kicked via right click
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

try this?

[code]if (playerRights == 0)
{
StatsMenu();
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Mod:”+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
BufferedWriter bw1 = null;

  try {
     bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
bw1.write(playerName+" kicked "+p5.playerName);
bw1.newLine();
bw1.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw1 != null) try {
    bw1.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
}
  }

}
try {
bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/kicklogs.txt”, true));
bw1.write(playerName+" kicked “+p5.playerName);
bw1.newLine();
bw1.flush();
} catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
} finally {
if (bw1 != null) try {
bw1.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
sendMessage(“Error logging kicks!”);
}
}
}
else if (playerRights >= 2)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+” Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p1.playerName;
}
}

break;[/code]

item.title: Trying to make it so Owner can't be kicked via right click
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

No, I added it correctly. Maybe you should take a look at the original right click kick:

[code]if (playerRights == 0)
{
StatsMenu();
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Mod:”+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
BufferedWriter bw1 = null;

  try {
     bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw1.write(playerName+" kicked "+p5.playerName);
 bw1.newLine();
 bw1.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw1 != null) try {
    bw1.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw1 = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/kicklogs.txt", true));
 bw1.write(playerName+" kicked "+p5.playerName);
 bw1.newLine();
 bw1.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw1 != null) try {
    bw1.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging kicks!");
 }
  }

}
else if (playerRights >= 2)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = p5.playerName;
}

break;[/code]

item.title: Trying to make it so Owner can't be kicked via right click
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

[code]else if (playerRights == 1)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
String victim = p5.playerName;
if((p5.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)) {
sendMessage(“You can not kick the owner!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Mod:”+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
BufferedWriter bw1 = null;
}
}

else if (playerRights >= 2)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
if((p5.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“iceman”)) {
sendMessage(“You can not kick the owner!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}
}[/code] Should work ;).

item.title: Trying to make it so Owner can't be kicked via right click
item.dc:creator: @monger monger
item.description:
@monger wrote:

else if (playerRights == 1)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
String victim = p5.playerName;
		if(p5.playerNameequalsIgnoreCase("iceman")) {
		sendMessage("You can not kick the owner!");
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod:"+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
      BufferedWriter bw1 = null;
}
}

      
else if (playerRights >= 2)
{
int pIndex2 = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
client p5 = (client) server.playerHandler.players[pIndex2];
if(p5.playerNameequalsIgnoreCase("iceman")) {
		sendMessage("You can not kick the owner!");
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin:"+" Player Kicked: "+p5.playerName;
PlayerHandler.kickNick = playerName;
}
}

Try that. I’m not 100% sure it will work since I just did that off the top of my head. If it doesn’t work. the “p5.playerNameequalsIgnoreCase” is wrong. That should be whatever the kicked person’s ID is. You had it so that if YOU kicked somebody it would say that you can’t kick the owner.

Edit - Java beat me and his looks prettier anyways. =/

Read full topic

item.title: Trying to make it so Owner can't be kicked via right click
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

case 153: int index = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian(); client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index]; String victim = v.playerName; if(v.equalsIgnoreCase("iceman")) { sendMessage("You cannot kick the owner!"); disconnected = true; } else if(playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Mod: playerName+" kicked: "+v.playerName+"; PlayerHandler.kickNick = v.playerName; } else if(playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin: playerName+" kicked: "+v.playerName+"; PlayerHandler.kickNick = v.playerName; }
